segments.text: Yes . I'd like to borrow these books .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just a second . I'll see if I can find them for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here you are . You must return them within a month .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What happens if I'm not finished with them in a month ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can come in and renew them unless someone else has reserved them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . Thank you very much for your trouble .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No trouble at all . So long .
segments.speaker: S1
